attributes.title: Review
attributes.review:
When the app was
Fully downloaded I opened it and it asked me for gender and race so I put In my gender (female) and my race (white and  brown) and it immediately contacted me and said u cannot have this app because u r a woman and brown and we don’t like u type of people

attributes.title: This app is dangerous
attributes.review: I started downloading this app 3 weeks ago and it finally just downloaded. I wanted to support the president but when I opened the app it gave me a vicious virus. It was so bad the my phone completely erased everything.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: this app is absolutely awful. it barely works and the few times it works, it just crashes. This app also took a very very long time to download. This app is absolutely terrible and not worth downloading.

attributes.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED 😔😔😛 TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app was so so so, terrible. there were awful glitches and the whole set was very ghetto to me. all i was trying to do was keep up with the stale cheeto puff and i ended up being very disappointed ☹️ with my experience in this app. 😌✨❤️❤️❤️🥰.

attributes.title: Tunisian Gelato
attributes.review: I would like to share my personal experience with this app. Not only it took me 64 hours to download it, the amount of personal information it requires is ridiculous. I won’t be selling my privacy.

attributes.title: zero stars
attributes.review: if there was any way to rate this app zero stars i absolutely would. i downloaded this app in hopes of supporting the good president trump himself during his campaign🥰🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸... but when i opened the app (after three days of downloading) president obama’s face was on the front page?!!!!???! as soon as i saw this i closed the app and tried to contact customer service but absolutely no response. this company should be ashamed of themselves. zero stars from me.

attributes.title: NEVER again
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash a billion times. I took it to the store and they said this app gave my phone a virus. I knew Trump was up to something! The apple store worker  said there was an unknown tracking device in the app. DONT GET IT! It’s a trap!

attributes.title: ew 🙄🤮
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to keep up with the president not cheeto dust. i dont know what that ugly orange on my screen was put im crying cuz it hurt so bad. for all the karens that support the orange i hope your enjoying getting ur hair done rn. Just a note to the orange 🤩🥰you remind me of my therapist..🧚‍♀️🥰😇take out *the* 🥰😍

attributes.title: This man
attributes.review: I hate the fact that he even got to be the president of the USA it’s unbelievable and plus all the things he had done to our country and the things he has in mind for 2020 I don’t like him so I’m leaving one star

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: This app is cursed my dad friends sisters husband cousins twin daughters died. Like she is DEAD and this happened right when I downloaded this app. I just came to support out totally no racist president who supports all people but noooo the little girl is now dead. Fly high little angel 👼
